name: GridCellParams
description: Object passed as parameter in the column GridColDef cell renderer.

properties.name: api
properties.description: GridApi that let you manipulate the grid.

properties.name: colDef
properties.description: The column of the row that the current cell belongs to.

properties.name: field
properties.description: The column field of the cell that triggered the event

properties.name: formattedValue
properties.description: The cell value formatted with the column valueFormatter.

properties.name: getValue
properties.description: Get the cell value of a row and field.

properties.name: hasFocus
properties.description: If true, the cell is the active element.

properties.name: isEditable
properties.description: If true, the cell is editable.

properties.name: row
properties.description: The row model of the row that the current cell belongs to.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The cell value, but if the column has valueGetter, use getValue.
